law.catch_line: ** TAKES EFFECT JULY 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 674 OF 2012 **...
law.text:
** TAKES EFFECT JULY 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 674 OF 2012 **
Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, the Act applies to a transaction or lien within its scope, even if the transaction or lien was entered into or created before the Act takes effect.
The Act does not affect an action, case, or proceeding commenced before the Act takes effect.
